meanings.sent1: The diabetogenic diet led to an increase in blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent2: Regular consumption of sugary drinks can be diabetogenic.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake was so diabetogenic, it practically screamed 'diabetes'!
meanings.sent4: Her love for sweets was as diabetogenic as pouring sugar directly into her veins.
meanings.sent5: The diabetogenic foods in the pantry were like little temptations waiting to spike blood sugar.

meanings.definition: Having the potential to induce diabetes.
meanings.sent1: The diabetogenic medication may increase the risk of developing diabetes.
meanings.sent2: A sedentary lifestyle can be diabetogenic for some individuals.
meanings.sent3: The overly sweet dessert had a diabetogenic charm that was hard to resist.
meanings.sent4: His careless eating habits were diabetogenic, paving the way for future health issues.
meanings.sent5: The diabetogenic nature of processed foods was evident in the rising diabetes rates.
